#!This file is autogenerated by the CBTek Code Base Manager
#####################################################

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.0)
project(ThePromptMachine)
get_filename_component(PROJECT_ROOT ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} PATH)

set (CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake")

include(${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}/flags.cmake)
include(${CMAKE_MODULE_PATH}/build.cmake)

set(LIBRARY_TYPE STATIC)
set (ENABLE_COMMON_UTILS_UNIT_TESTS ON)

if (WIN32)
    set (PLATFORM WIN32)
endif()

include_directories("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/utility")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/qt_utility")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/common/math")
add_subdirectory("${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/products/ThePromptMachine")
